speaker: Frozen Wastes
line: A field of ice-glass stretches to the horizon. Under it, faint shapes drift like thoughts you almost remember.

speaker: Your Breath
line: Each exhale feels borrowed. The cold counts them.

speaker: Your Journal
line: If you linger, do it with purpose.

choices.text: Seek the next task the wastes can offer.
